notes.t1: Coverage-first batches: each doc appears exactly once per clustering in T1 base pool; anchors are reused across experts.
notes.t2: Unique pairs per clustering from a global pool; allocated by popping (no repeats across experts until pool exhausted).
notes.v2_patch: Patched from pap_eval_seed42_m5_pairs18: replaced E9 within-expert duplicate pair (A_pair_0297 -> A_pair_0297_v2) and E5 cross-expert duplicate pair (C_pair_0020 -> C_pair_0020_v2).
